nodes.text: Gathal Anager was an individual. It was believed that when Norulac pirates entered the Taanab system in 4 ABY, Lando Calrissian made a bet with Anager that he could single-handily defeat them. Calrissian eventually did defeat the pirates during the Battle of Taanab and won the deeds to a Clendoran brewery as a result of the bet.
